ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: Allegiance
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
The Allegiance, made up of remnants of the Russian Forces and formerly aided by foreign mercenaries and rogue soldiers. Allegiance spent years at war with Coalition forces until the mechanoids invaded. They were left with no choice but to work with their enemies under an armistice.
